kv5.3:6.8: Hañci kusalaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv5.3:7.1: Anicce niccanti vipariyeso, so ca akusaloti?
kv5.3:7.3: Pathavīkasiṇaṃ samāpattiṃ samāpannassa viparīte ñāṇaṃ, tañca akusalanti?
kv5.3:7.10: asubhe subhanti vipariyeso, so ca akusaloti?
kv5.3:7.12: Pathavīkasiṇaṃ samāpattiṃ samāpannassa viparīte ñāṇaṃ, tañca akusalanti?
kv5.3:8.1: Pathavīkasiṇaṃ samāpattiṃ samāpannassa viparīte ñāṇaṃ, tañca akusalanti?
kv5.3:8.3: Anicce niccanti vipariyeso, so ca kusaloti?
kv5.3:8.6: pathavīkasiṇaṃ samāpattiṃ samāpannassa viparīte ñāṇaṃ, tañca akusalanti?
kv5.3:8.12: asubhe subhanti vipariyeso, so ca kusaloti?
kv5.3:9.5: Hañci arahā pathavīkasiṇaṃ samāpattiṃ samāpajjeyya, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv5.3:10.1: Pathavīkasiṇaṃ samāpattiṃ samāpannassa viparīte ñāṇaṃ, arahā pathavīkasiṇaṃ samāpattiṃ samāpajjeyyāti?
kv5.3:12.3: Hañci natthi arahato saññāvipariyeso cittavipariyeso diṭṭhivipariyeso, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv5.3:13.6: Tena hi pathavīkasiṇaṃ samāpattiṃ samāpannassa viparīte ñāṇanti.
kv5.3:14.3: Nanu pathavī atthi, atthi ca koci pathaviṃ pathavito samāpajjatīti?
kv5.3:14.5: Hañci pathavī atthi, atthi ca koci pathaviṃ pathavito samāpajjati, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv5.3:15.1: Pathavī atthi, pathaviṃ pathavito samāpajjantassa viparītaṃ hotīti?
kv5.3:15.3: Nibbānaṃ atthi, nibbānaṃ nibbānato samāpajjantassa viparītaṃ hotīti?
